help.title: Help
help.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Chinese Vocabulary Flashcard App! This app helps you learn Chinese words through interactive flashcards.
help.noLoginRequired: You can start learning immediately without logging in. Google login allows you to save your learning progress.
help.viewWordsDesc: Click the "Show Chinese Characters" button to view the Chinese characters.
help.listenPronunciationDesc: Click the speaker button (üîä) to hear the Chinese pronunciation.
help.markMemorizedDesc: Click the checkbox to mark words as memorized. (Login required)
help.navigationButtonsDesc: Use the previous/next buttons at the bottom of the screen to navigate through words.
help.shuffleWordsDesc: Use the "Shuffle Words" button to randomize the word order.
help.dayFilterDesc: Use the Day filter if you want to study words from a specific day only.
help.googleLoginDesc: Click the "Sign in with Google" button at the top right of the screen.
help.personalSheetDesc: After logging in, your personal Google Sheets will be automatically created when you first access the settings page.
help.autoCreationProcess: Login ‚Üí Visit Settings Page ‚Üí Auto-create Google Sheets ‚Üí Sync vocabulary data
help.permissionRequestDesc: Why we request Google Sheets and Google Drive permissions during login:
help.sheetsPermission: To import vocabulary data from the specified sheet in settings to the app's database
help.drivePermission: To securely access the specified sheet file
privacyPoints: We only access the Google Sheet file with the ID specified in settings
We do not access other Google Drive files or sheets
All data is processed only within your personal Google account

galaxyGuide.title: Galaxy Chinese Voice Setup Guide
galaxyGuide.description: For Chinese pronunciation to work properly on Galaxy phones, Chinese language pack must be installed.

step1.title: Open Galaxy Settings App
step1.description: Find and touch the Settings (‚öôÔ∏è) app on your home screen.
step1.details: The Settings app is usually in the app drawer or on the home screen.

step2.title: General Management ‚Üí Language and Input
step2.description: In Settings, find 'General Management' and touch it, then select 'Language and Input'.
step2.details: Depending on your device, it might be 'General' or 'Language and Region' menu.

step3.title: Add Language
step3.description: In the language list, touch 'Add Language' or '+' button.
step3.details: Make sure Korean is currently set up.

step4.title: Add Chinese (Simplified)
step4.description: Find and add '‰∏≠Êñá(ÁÆÄ‰Ωì)' or 'Chinese (Simplified, China)' from the language list.
step4.details: After adding, both Korean and Chinese (Simplified) should appear in the language list.

galaxyGuide.completionNote: After completing the setup, restart the app and Chinese pronunciation will work normally.

help.saveProgress: Login with your Google account to automatically save your learning progress and memorized words.
